>>Igor Ranitovic wrote:

>>Hi!
>>Thanks for your help. After adding a postselector regexp filter with the
>>same regexp the crawler seems to fetch only .hu pages. Transitive filter
>>is disabled, and I think additioinalFocusFilter is set disabled when
>>using FilterScope.
>>
>>peter

>>
